name: integrations-service
description: <!-- title: 'Serverless Framework Node Express API on AWS' description: 'This template demonstrates how to develop and deploy a simple Node Express API running on AWS Lambda using the Serverless Framework.' layout: Doc framework: v4 platform: AWS language: nodeJS priority: 1 authorLink: 'https://github.com/serverless' authorName: 'Serverless, Inc.' authorAvatar: 'https://avatars1.githubusercontent.com/u/13742415?s=200&v=4' -->

scripts.dev: env $(cat .env | xargs) nodemon --exec serverless offline --stage dev --noAuth --noTimeout --reloadHandler --verbose
